title: Install Helper Tool
body: To keep your computer safe, please download and install our Helper Tool.

choices.label: Download and Install
choices.feedback: Risky choice. Unknown files can hide malware. Only download apps from official stores or the company’s real website.

choices.label: No, take me back
choices.feedback: Good choice. Do not install tools from pop-ups or unknown links. Use the official store or the company’s real website.
